milestones.name: Gauntlet Initiate
milestones.description: Reach mastery level 10 with any Gauntlet.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Contender
milestones.description: Reach mastery level 25 with any Gauntlet.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Warrior
milestones.description: Reach mastery level 50 with any Gauntlet.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Veteran
milestones.description: Reach mastery level 75 with any Gauntlet.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Champion
milestones.description: Reach mastery level 99 with any Gauntlet.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Runner
milestones.description: Accumulate 50 total Gauntlet mastery levels.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Grinder
milestones.description: Accumulate 100 total Gauntlet mastery levels.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Conqueror
milestones.description: Accumulate 200 total Gauntlet mastery levels.

milestones.name: Gauntlet Legend
milestones.description: Master all Gauntlets to level 99.
